main event: A UFO was sighted near Madrid, Spain on February 19, 1961, which exploded at an altitude of 10-15 degrees above the horizon.
interesting points: The object was first sighted at an elevation of 42-45 degrees and described as moving down very fast., The object was exceptionally bright and large, initially suggesting it might be an aircraft., A distinct particle separation was noted when the object exploded., The total sighting duration was estimated at 2-3 seconds., The explosion back-lit clouds over ridges approximately 15 miles east of Madrid.
sighted object: a bright and large unidentified flying object
witness description: High Record Clark and Sgt. George Wojickla of Det 31, 21st Weather Squadron
